alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 9:09PM PST until March 07 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes Highway 33 in Ventura County as well as Interstate 5 and Highway 14 in Los Angeles County. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although winds are currently subsiding below advisory levels, a short period of advisory level winds is expected late tonight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
